channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Scriptless Social Sharing
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Scriptless Social Sharing

item.title: CVE-2023-0377|2024-08-02T05:10:55.691Z -- unknown -- scriptless%20social%20sharing
item.description: The Scriptless Social Sharing WordPress plugin before 3.2.2 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
